page.title: 17Land use.
page.content: 04_54 This area is roughly divided in half by the road.Northside arable used for cereal crops.South_rough grazing. 04_53 All rough grassland for grazing cattle and sheep.Also a small header reservoir used to help with the pumping of water to the Tees. 04_52 33% arable 66% grassland and a small plantation of conifers. 05_52 grassland skirted by conifers. 05_53 10% conifer wood.90% grazing. 05_54 80% arable 20% grassland. 06_54 66% grassland with 33% wooded area in the centre,conifers. 06_53 Mostly grassland with a few small plantations of Larch and Scots_pine. 06_52 Predominately arable on the east of the road mostly wooded on west
